units.title: Wash and nucleus pelleting
units.text: washed with 1 ml chilled wash buffer (10 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.4, 10 mM NaCl, 3 mM MgCl2, 0.1% Tween-20, 1% BSA) and nuclei were pelleted at Single-cell RNA-seq library preparation and sequencing 500g for 5 min at 4 °C.
units.rationale: Describes a concrete washing step followed by centrifugation to collect nuclei.

units.title: Single‑cell RNA‑seq library generation
units.text:
Single-cell RNA-seq libraries were generated using the 10X Genomics Chromium 3′ Gene Expressi
After 18 days, organoids with 2 mM EDTA and a 1:50 dilution of H3K27ac primary antibody (Cell Signaling 8173), and incubated overnight at 4 °C on an overhead rotaorbital shaker rotating at 90 rpm, and changed to Dulbecco’s modified tor.
units.rationale: Specifies the platform and method for creating scRNA‑seq libraries.

units.title: Secondary antibody incubation
units.text: (Novex A16031) was added at a dilution of 1:50 in 100 μl dig-wash buffer and incubated at room temperature for 30 min while rotating.
units.rationale: Provides the secondary antibody concentration and incubation parameters.

units.title: pA‑Tn5 addition for CUT&Tag
units.text: pA-Tn5 was added at a dilution of 1:100 in 100 μl dig-med buffer (0.05% digitonin, 20 mM HEPES, pH 7.5, 150 mM NaCl, 0.5 mM spermidine, 1× protease inhibitor cocktail (Roche)).
units.rationale: Specifies the tagmentation enzyme addition step in CUT&Tag.

units.title: DNA purification with AMPure XP beads
units.text: DNA was purified with a 1.5:1 ratio of AMPure XP beads (Beckman) following the manufacturer’s instructions. Purified DNA was eluted in 21 μl buffer EB (10 mM Tris-Cl, pH 8.5).
units.rationale: Outlines the bead‑based DNA cleanup and elution procedure.

units.title: Library PCR amplification
units.text: Libraries were amplified with the cycling conditions: 72 °C for 5 min; 98 °C for 30 s; 12 cycles of 98 °C for 10 s and 63 °C for 30 s; 72 °C for 5 min.
units.rationale: Provides the thermal cycling program for library enrichment.

units.title: Sequencing on Illumina NovaSeq
units.text: libraries were generated and sequenced on an Illumina NovaSeq with a target sequencing depth of 50 million reads per library.
units.rationale: States the sequencing platform and desired read depth.
